meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be compensated.
meanings.sent1: Her compensabilities allowed her to receive fair payment for her hard work.
meanings.sent2: The company's compensabilities included paid time off and health benefits.
meanings.sent3: His compensabilities were so impressive that he could easily negotiate for a higher salary.
meanings.sent4: The compensabilities of the job were like a safety net, ensuring no one would be left unrewarded.
meanings.sent5: Understanding your compensabilities is crucial in ensuring you are fairly remunerated for your efforts.

meanings.sent1: The lost luggage was one of the compensabilities covered by the travel insurance.
meanings.sent2: The compensabilities of the contract included reimbursement for any damages incurred.
meanings.sent3: His forgetfulness became a running joke among friends, but it was just one of his compensabilities.
meanings.sent4: The compensabilities of the damaged goods were swiftly addressed by the responsible party.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the compensabilities in the agreement is essential to avoid any financial losses.
